name: The way it rains on animals
name_original: The way it rains on animals
description:
(Note: dont accidentally give npcs every one of your umbrellas you'll be soft locked heh)

A little game I made in a day using bitsy. Apologies for no sound, I know you can add sound to bitsy by using hacks but I just didn't have it in me tonight. Consider this the game equivalent of a doodle on a post-it note. 

But yeah, a short game in a pet cemetery. Get some umbrellas before it rains!

(Not canon to Nociception universe)
